RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 56. Maiden Special Weight Purse 24300. FOR MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 122 lbs. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ROYALLY FLUSHED with the second flight two wide, rallied three wide through the turn to make the lead at the top of the stretch, set the balance of the pace and shook clear late under right handed urging. MANSION PARTY pressed the pace two wide down the backstretch, gained a narrow lead entering the turn, set a pressured pace to the top of the stretch then couldn't handle the winner. CUSSIN N FUSSIN with the second flight along the inside, shifted to the four path in upper stretch and finished with good courage. MR. BLUTARSKY set a pressured pace along the inside down the backstretch, remained a sharp threat along the rail into the stretch and faded late. HEARTFELT KARTER bumped start, clipped heels soon thereafter and was no threat. FOX CREEK bumped at the start, drifted in a few strides out of the gate causing HEARTFELT KARTER to clip his heels then failed to menace.

ENTRY.NAME: Heartfelt Karter
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, clipped heels leaving chute, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Fox Creek
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, drifted in, heels clipped leaving chute

ENTRY.NAME: Cussin N Fussin
ENTRY.OWNER: Urieta's Racing Stable and Marchosky Ernest
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight inside, shifted 4path, finished determinedly

ENTRY.NAME: Royally Flushed
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight 2 wide, rallied 3w, turn, drew clear, right urging

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Little's Farm, Conrad Little, et al.

ENTRY.NAME: Mr. Blutarsky
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace inside, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: Mansion Party
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, led second best,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 2 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 59. Maiden Claiming Purse 12200. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MOONTAP was bumped at the start, stalked the pace three wide into the far turn, made the lead past the three furlong marker then widened at will through the stretch to win as much the best while taken in hand late. HEART OF THE BEAST unhurried early, rallied in the six path into the stretch then was no match for the winner while well clear for second. HOLY SKULL pressed the pace two wide into the far turn, made the lead briefly, kept on along the rail into the stretch and weakened late. DUDE'S MIST DATE failed to menace. RUNNETH OVER well placed, was through after a half. BAD AND BEAUTIFUL bore in at the start bumping the winner, set a pressured pace along the inside to the seven sixteenths pole then stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Moontap
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, stalked 3w, quick move 2nd turn, much the best,

ENTRY.NAME: Bad and Beautiful
ENTRY.COMMENT: bore in, bumped start, early pace, stopped 2nd turn,

ENTRY.NAME: Heart of the Beast
ENTRY.OWNER: The Four Horsemen Racing Stable Inc
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried, middle move 6path, no match for winner,

ENTRY.NAME: Holy Skull
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, led briefly into far turn, weakened inside,

ENTRY.NAME: Runneth Over
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Dude's Mist Date
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 64. Claiming Purse 12200. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 7 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MAMITA LINDA chased the lead into the far turn, took command two wide past the three furlong marker, set the balance of the paced and shook clear late under strong handling. MAGESTAL BASTIDA unhurried early, closed willingly two wide through the stretch and finished second best. FABIOLA PRINCESS sprinted to a daylight lead soon after the start., set the pace into the far turn, dug in determinedly along the rail but was outfinished. AYY LADIES was hung four wide into the first turn, improved position outside rivals on the far turn then leveled off late. SOULSTONE raced three wide into the clubhouse turn, shifted out to the six path entering the stretch then finished evenly four wide. TORIANNE was outrun. JUMP INTO SANITY close up near the inside early, was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Fabiola Princess
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted clear, set pace past 3/8 pole, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Magestal Bastida
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, closed willingly, 2 wide, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Jump Into Sanity
ENTRY.COMMENT: close inside, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Soulstone
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3 wide, first turn, angled out upper stretch, even finish 4 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Mamita Linda
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, took over 2 wide 2nd turn, drew off, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Ayy Ladies
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4 wide first turn, improved outside far turn, leveled off

ENTRY.NAME: Torianne
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 66. Claiming Purse 14300. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 7 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $6,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HARDLY MISCHIEVOUS sped to the lead three wide midway on the clubhouse turn, set all the pace while getting slow fractions, turned back a strong bid from the runner up at the top of the stretch and drew clear late under right handed urging. STORMIN MELLY never far back, loomed boldly two wide at the top of the stretch, matched strides past the furlong marker and was denied by the winner while well clear for second. PEARLINTHEROUGH chased the winner early, dropped back before a half then lacked the needed response. CONTESSINA had a brief lead soon after the start, remained within striking distance for six furlongs then flattened out.

ENTRY.NAME: Contessina
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief early lead, close up 1/4 pole, flattened out,

ENTRY.NAME: Stormin Melly
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, loomed boldly 2 wide top lane, denied

ENTRY.NAME: Pearlintherough
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased early, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Hardly Mischievous
ENTRY.OWNER: Ten Strike Racing and Cory Moelis Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead 3 wide, set slow pace, repulse bid, drew clear

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 5 1M Dirt CR: 56. Allowance Purse 33700. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 7 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DOMINIQUE'S NIGHT broke in front, set a pressured pace into the stretch then widened the balance of the trip under right handed urging to win as much the best. QUEENIE ROSE allowed to settle, closed willingly along the rail into the stretch and finished well clear for second. COMPUTER WHIZ unhurried early, responded with a rapid moved in the four path on the far turn to offer a challenge entering the stretch then came up empty. ANGEL'S DESTINY offered a mild bid four wide into the far turn then weakened. DEE'S KY WILDCAT failed to menace. PENNY'S TREASURE was no threat. SHAKA'S LYRIC pressured the winner two wide and was through after a half. TOTAL SMOKESHOW stalked the pace three wide into the far bend then gave way. OH EYE SEE with the second flight inside, tired on the far turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Computer Whiz
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried, quick move 4path far turn, empty,

ENTRY.NAME: Oh Eye See
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, inside, tired far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Dominique's Night
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, set pressured pace, full of run, much the best,

ENTRY.NAME: Shaka's Lyric
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Queenie Rose
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, closed willingly rail, clear second

ENTRY.NAME: Total Smokeshow
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 3 wide, gave way lane

ENTRY.NAME: Penny's Treasure
ENTRY.COMMENT: no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Dee's Ky Wildcat
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Angel's Destiny
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move 4 wide, weakened,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 6 1M Dirt CR: 83. Claiming Purse 25900. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 7 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000 (Races Where Entered For $10,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).). ).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: VISUAL MISSION trailed for a half, circled his field on the far turn to engage the leader before the quarter pole, battled the balance the trip two wide and proved best under mild left handed urging. SPEEDY MOBILE away alertly, set the pace along the inside into the stretch, dug in gamely along the rail then couldn't handle the winner in the final stages. OHIO EAGLE chased the pace three then two wide and finished best of the rest in the four path. GOLD N SILVER stalked the pace along the inside into the stretch then weakened. FIRSTHAND JUSTICE well placed, failed to respond. RUMBLE STRIP RON was no factor. SERVE REVENGE COLD failed to menace. THE STEWARDS POSTED THE INQUIRY SIGN BUT TOOK NO ACTION. DUE TO A TIMER MALFUNCTION RACE WAS HAND TIMED.

ENTRY.NAME: Gold N Silver
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked inside, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Speedy Mobile
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace inside, dug in gamely, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Ohio Eagle
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3 wide, best of rest 4path

ENTRY.NAME: Serve Revenge Cold
ENTRY.OWNER: Urieta Racing Stable and Sadey David
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Firsthand Justice
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed, failed to respond,

ENTRY.NAME: Rumble Strip Ron
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Visual Mission
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, circled field, surged left urging, in time

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 7 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 75. Allowance Purse 25900. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 7 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: THERESASILVERLININ pressed the pace two wide past the quarter pole in hand, made the lead at the top of the stretch, responded under left then right handed urging to draw well clear through the final furlong to win as much the best. HONORABLE WOMAN sped to the lead along the inside soon after the start, set the pace to the top of the stretch, angled off the rail to the three path near the furlong marker and was no match for the winner. FULL TIME STRUTIN stalked the pace three wide into the stretch and finished evenly. MY D'VALENTINE saved ground while close up early and faded in the stretch. WICKED WONDER dropped back from an alert start and trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Honorable Woman
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pace inside, no match for winner,

ENTRY.NAME: My d'Valentine
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: Theresasilverlinin
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 2w, took charge top lane, drew off, much the best,

ENTRY.NAME: Wicked Wonder
ENTRY.COMMENT: dropped back, trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Full Time Strutin
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 3wide, evenly,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 66. Maiden Special Weight Purse 31800. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MOBIL MEMORY broke in full stride to set all the pace off the rail in the four then five paths, turned back a bid from the runner up on the turn then drew off through deep stretch under right handed urging and won as much the best. CANELA FINA away alertly, stalked the early pace three wide, offered a strong bid outside the winner nearing the quarter pole then was no match while second best. MOST ADORABLE pressed the early pace along the inside and went evenly. CABARET FLEUR saved ground and lacked the needed response. UNEXPECTEDVALENTYN failed to menace. SHE'S A BIG GIRL was no threat. MI CANCION steadied along the rail near the five eighths pole and was no factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Mi Cancion
ENTRY.COMMENT: steadied rail 5/8pole, no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Unexpectedvalentyn
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Cabaret Fleur
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: She's a Big Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Most Adorable
ENTRY.OWNER: Yoder Susan and Rivera Alan Yahir
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace inside, even finish rail

ENTRY.NAME: Canela Fina
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked 3 wide, loomed boldly 5path turn, no match for winner,

ENTRY.NAME: Mobil Memory
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, led throughout, repulsed bid, much the best
